Title: Why Every Entrepreneur Struggles With Insecurity
Description:
Today we’ll hear about:

  • A business owner struggling with insecurity and whether she has what it takes to be her company’s CEO
  • Carey Lohrenz talks with Dave about why leaders shouldn’t avoid fear
  • A caller wants to know if they should buy the failing business that her boss bought for his ex-girlfriend
  • How racing competitors to the bottom line will leave you both broke and the real way you should price out your competition
